game.name: ROUNDS
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 스크린 공유 및 분할 PvP, 공유 및 분할 화면, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Rounds is a 1v1 rogue-lite shooter where each round gets more intense. The losing player of each round unlocks clever upgrades to create a better build to counter their opponent.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Rounds is a 1v1 rogue-lite shooter where each round gets more intense. The losing player of each round unlocks clever upgrades to create a better build to counter their opponent.

reviewHighlights.text: 다 좋지만 사람이 없어 할수가 없습니다
포이즌을 5개 먹으면 핵이 됩니다! 저도 알고 싶진 않았어요..
